column2:
<flag>
An unique string to identify the global flag with.
column3:
set_global_flag = my_flag 
set_global_flag = my_flag@ROOT 
set_global_flag = my_flag@event_target:name
column5: Flags can be appended with scopes or event targets

column2:
<flag>
The unique string of a global flag to clear.

<string>
An localized string to display in the tooltip
column4: Displays a localized key in the effect tooltip.

column2:
<string>
An string to in the game.log
column4: Displays a string in the game.log when executed.

column2:
<string>
An unique string to identify the event target with.
column4: Saves the current scope as a key. Is cleared once execution ends (i.e. end of event).
column5: Use event_target:<key> to access the scope.

column2:
<string>
An unique string to identify the global event target with.
column4: Saves the current scope as a key. Persists after execution until cleared via effect.
column5: Use event_target:<key> to access the scope.

column2:
<string>
The unique string of the global event target to clear.
column4: Clears a specific global event target.

column2:
<string>
The unique string of the ambient object to show.
column4: Displays a hidden ambient object from the map/ambient_objects.txt file.

column2:
<string>
The unique string of the ambient object to hide.
column4: Hides a visible ambient object from the map/ambient_objects.txt file.
